channel.title: MarkDown Experiences on DWNM
channel.description: Recent content in MarkDown Experiences on DWNM

item.title: MarkDown
item.description: Headers These statements: # This is an <h1> tag ## This is an <h2> tag ###### This is an <h6> tag will give: This is an <h1> tag This is an <h2> tag This is an <h6> tag Emphasis *This text will be italic* _This will also be italic_ **This text will be bold** __This will also be bold__ _You **can** combine them_ ~~This will striked throug~~
